channel.title: Comments on: At Last!
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Jeff
item.dc:creator: Jeff
item.description:
Glad to hear you're happy with the sample. The pictures look great!
Definitely excited about purchasing a copy of my own!
item.content:encoded:
Glad to hear you’re happy with the sample. The pictures look great!

Definitely excited about purchasing a copy of my own!

item.title: By: monica
item.dc:creator: monica
item.content:encoded:
Congratulations to the proud father!!! It is definitely your “brain child” as it were…. I am so excited as well, and I can’t wait until other people (namely me, but why be selfish?) can play.

I am so very, very happy for you. You’ve been waiting for this for a long time.

“The world is waiting there for you….”
